wf_workflow_version.name: u_mvc
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_activity.name: Approval Request Notification to submitter and requested for

sys_variable_value.value:
Your request ${URI_REF} for Meeting/Visit/Call is Pending Approval. You will receive additional updates as your request is reviewed. ${URI_REF}
Thank you, The Export Compliance Team
